metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25074 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
The cache action in action/cache.py in MoinMoin through 1.9.10 allows directory traversal through a crafted HTTP request. An attacker who can upload attachments to the wiki can use this to achieve remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-moinmoin - 1.9.8-1ubuntu1.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.8-1ubuntu1.16.04.3').
